local_intent: Detect, align to, close gripper on the green bottle, then verify the grasp is stable.
assumptions: Green bottle is detectable and reachable on the table.
Gripper is operational for a 20N close.
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase of the global tree: DetectObject -> ApproachAndAlign -> CloseGripper(force=20, timeout=1000) -> IsGraspStable.
